ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: Valueset is meant to identify the race Black or African American),(Data Element Scope: This value set is meant to be used with the QDM Datatype Patient Characteristic Race),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set includes codes from CDCREC Code System that represent Black or African American),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set excludes all codes from the CDCREC Code System that are ethnicities or races besides Black or African American)
